thm eqelb(class c0, class c1, class c2) {

} = {
  impbii(wa(wceq(c0, c1), wcel(c0, c2)), wa(wceq(c0, c1), wcel(c1, c2)))

  jca(wa(wceq(c1, c0), wcel(c0, c2)), wceq(c1, c0), wcel(c1, c2))

  eqeltr(c0, c1, c2)
}

thm imaexALTV(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {

  ssexg(cima(c0, c2), crn(c0), universe)

  syl(wcel(c2, c4), wcel(cuni(cqs(c2, c0)), universe), wcel(cqs(c2, c0), universe))

  uniexg(cqs(c2, c0), universe)

blocks.origin:
thm cnvepresex(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cres(ccnv(cep), c0), universe))
} = {
  syl5eqel(cres(ccnv(cep), c0), universe, copab(hs0, hs1, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)))), wcel(c0, c1))
  cnvepres(hs0, hs1, c0)
  opabex3d(hs0, hs1, c0, wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)))
  elex(c0, c1)
  a1i(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wcel(cab(hs1, wcel(cv(hs1), cv(hs0))), universe))
  eqeltri(cab(hs1, wcel(cv(hs1), cv(hs0))), universe, cv(hs0))
  abid2(hs1, cv(hs0))
  vex(hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(c0, c1))
  diff.hs1.c(cv(hs0))
}

blocks.name: eccnvepex
blocks.content: The converse epsilon coset exists. (Contributed by Peter Mazsa, 22-Mar-2023.)

blocks.name: cnvepimaex
blocks.content: The image of converse epsilon exists, proof via ~ imaexALTV (see also ~ cnvepima and ~ uniexg for alternate way). (Contributed by Peter Mazsa, 22-Mar-2023.)

blocks.name: cnvepima
blocks.content: The image of converse epsilon. (Contributed by Peter Mazsa, 22-Mar-2023.)

blocks.name: inex2ALTV
blocks.content: Sufficient condition for an intersection relation to be a set, see also ~ inex1g . (Contributed by Peter Mazsa, 19-Dec-2018.)

blocks.name: inex3
blocks.content: Sufficient condition for the intersection relation to be a set. (Contributed by Peter Mazsa, 24-Nov-2019.)

blocks.name: inxpex
blocks.content: Sufficient condition for an intersection with a Cartesian product to be a set. (Contributed by Peter Mazsa, 10-May-2019.)

blocks.name: eqres
blocks.content: Converting a class constant definition by restriction (like ~ df-ers or ~~? df-parts ) into a binary relation. (Contributed by Peter Mazsa, 1-Oct-2018.)

blocks.name: brrabga
blocks.content: The law of concretion for operation class abstraction. (Contributed by Peter Mazsa, 24-Oct-2022.)
blocks.origin:
thm brrabga(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5)), wb(wbr(cop(c0, c2), c6, c4), w0))
  -| wi(w3a(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c2), wceq(cv(s2), c4)), wb(w1, w0))
  -| wceq(c6, coprab(s0, s1, s2, w1))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c4)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
} = {
  syl5bb(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5)), wbr(cop(c0, c2), c6, c4), w0, wcel(cop(cop(c0, c2), c4), coprab(s0, s1, s2, w1)))
  bitri(wbr(cop(c0, c2), c6, c4), wcel(cop(cop(c0, c2), c4), coprab(s0, s1, s2, w1)), wcel(cop(cop(c0, c2), c4), c6))
  df-br(cop(c0, c2), c6, c4)
  eleq2i(cop(cop(c0, c2), c4), c6, coprab(s0, s1, s2, w1))
  eloprabga(s0, s1, s2, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, w1, w0)
}

blocks.name: brcnvrabga
blocks.content: The law of concretion for the converse of operation class abstraction. (Contributed by Peter Mazsa, 25-Oct-2022.)
blocks.origin:
thm brcnvrabga(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5)), wb(wbr(c0, c6, cop(c2, c4)), w0))
  -| wi(w3a(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c2), wceq(cv(s2), c4)), wb(w1, w0))
  -| wceq(c6, ccnv(coprab(s1, s2, s0, w1)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c4)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
} = {
  syl5bbr(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5)), wbr(c0, c6, cop(c2, c4)), w0, wbr(cop(c2, c4), ccnv(c6), c0))
  relbrcnv(cop(c2, c4), c6, c0)
  mpbir(wrel(c6), wrel(ccnv(coprab(s1, s2, s0, w1))))
  relcnv(coprab(s1, s2, s0, w1))
  releqi(c6, ccnv(coprab(s1, s2, s0, w1)))
  3comr(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5), wb(wbr(cop(c2, c4), ccnv(c6), c0), w0))
  brrabga(s1, s2, s0, c2, c3, c4, c5, c0, c1, ccnv(c6), w0, w1)
  3coml(wceq(cv(s1), c2), wceq(cv(s2), c4), wceq(cv(s0), c0), wb(w1, w0))
  eqtri(ccnv(c6), coprab(s1, s2, s0, w1), ccnv(ccnv(coprab(s1, s2, s0, w1))))
  cnveqi(c6, ccnv(coprab(s1, s2, s0, w1)))
  mpbi(wceq(ccnv(ccnv(coprab(s1, s2, s0, w1))), coprab(s1, s2, s0, w1)), wrel(coprab(s1, s2, s0, w1)))
  reloprab(s1, s2, s0, w1)
  dfrel2(coprab(s1, s2, s0, w1))
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
}
